question: The shown apparatus is used for
exp: Image shows Patella tendon bearing brace. Designed to un-weight foot & ankle. It decreases the amount of a person's weight being placed on their bones, joints, and tissue and can also immobilize painful joints of the foot.

question: Initial finding seen in knee TB
exp: Increase in joint space is initial finding seen in tuberculosis of knee joint. Triple knee deformity also occurs in knee TB. Triple knee deformity is flexion, external rotation, valgus at knee, associated with posterior subluxation of tibia.

question: Diagnosis of Gout is confirmed by which test?
exp: Gout: Characteristic GOUT PSEUDOGOUT Joint Great Toe Knee Crystal Deposited Uric-Acid-negatively birefringent-Needle shaped Calcium pyrophosphate-positively birefringent Rhomboid shaped Association Protein + Alcohol intake Hypothyroidism X-ray Bone and soft tissue erosions Chondrocalcinosis(calcification of the cailage)

question: A boy was riding bicycle, he fell down forward and injury to his shoulder was seen, which nerve injury will be seen in the condition as given in X-ray?
exp: Given X-ray is showing anterior dislocation of shoulder. Axillary neve is most commonly affected in shoulder injuries.

question: Post-menopausal woman, fell down in washroom. What is the most common fracture she may suffer?
exp: Colle's fracture is one of the mc fractures occurring in Post-menopausal woman as a result of increased risk of osteoporosis. Typically occurs as a result of falling on outstretched hand.

question: Avascular necrosis of femur head is due to which of the following aery?
exp: Reticular aery branch of medial circumflex femoral aery supplies the head of femur. In case of femur neck fracture, this aery may be occluded leading to avascular necrosis of femur head.
